game.name: Dice Roller Incremental
game.categories: Single-player, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Roll your dice, upgrade them, buy more dice! Dice Roller Incremental is a game where each dice roll earns you money, which you then spend on improving your dice rolls.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Roll your dice, upgrade them, buy more dice! Dice Roller Incremental is a game where each dice roll earns you money, which you then spend on improving your dice rolls.
